word:
God's word and His works contain the knowledge of Himself that He has seen fit to reveal to us. We may understand the 
                                                                           92
revelation that He has thus given of Himself. But it is with fear and trembling, and with a sense of our own sinfulness, that we are to take up this study, not with a desire to try to explain God, but with a desire to gain that knowledge which will enable us to serve Him more acceptably.
